display_long_description:
Magic Color Merge Puzzle reimagines the classic color sort genre with a stunning, immersive twist. Whether you prefer the ease of traditional clicks or the tactile thrill of pouring vibrant liquids by hand, this game lets you play your way - just like handling the real thing! But be careful… drop a bottle, and you might be in for a cleanup!

Journey through increasingly challenging levels that test your logic and creativity. Earn crystals as rewards, then use them to research and craft a magical potion series—your ultimate goal! Completing potion sets unlocks powerful boosters like double XP, extra tubes, and more.

Enjoy three new daily challenges every day for extra rewards and a fresh gameplay twist.

Want to experiment freely? Create your own custom games by choosing the number of tubes, colors, and game modes—perfect for strategizing or just relaxing fun.

Customize your experience with different liquid styles (normal, minimal bubbles, or color-only) and tube designs (reflective or classic). All set to a selection of varied music tracks that evolve with your journey.

Ready to pour, sort, and craft your way to magical mastery?
